segments.text: That overflowing sink is gross, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and making a filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has her foot in it, doesn't she realize?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate while ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those stacked dishes nearby might get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on a stool like that, what a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting, hand out like a beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats without permission, so naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen feels chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat, which makes this worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up after this.
segments.speaker: PAR
